values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_4THOFJULY_GEMS_1
values.value:
"Merchants from the Jade Sea have arrived on the shores of Westeros with abundant stores of gold!

Celebrate 4th of July with EVEN MORE GOLD! Using Gems to redeem bundles in the Store awards points towards this event.
If the purchases made with Gems contain Gold, that Gold will contribute to the progress of the separate 4th of July Celebration Event. Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase. Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends."

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FATHERSDAY_GEMS_1
values.value:
"Merchants from the Jade Sea have arrived on the shores of Westeros with abundant stores of gold!

Celebrate Father's Day with EVEN MORE GOLD! Using Gems to redeem bundles in the Store awards points towards this event.
If the purchases made with Gems contain Gold, that Gold will contribute to the progress of the separate Day of the Father Event. Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase. Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends."

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_FREEDOM_SWEEPS_TOURNAMENT_1
values.value:
A tournament is rumored to be held among the weirwoods on the Isle of Faces to decide who the Old Gods truly favor-- and only those who still honor the Old Ways will be called upon... will you heed their summons?

 * Kingdoms compete with one another by earning Tournament Points from each of the power-progressing events running this week.
 * Tournament Points are rewarded at the end of each event based on a ranking of the cumulative points scored by all players of each kingdom.
 * At the end of the week, a Kingdom Ranking Leaderboard will bestow rewards to all players based on their kingdoms ranking!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_200
values.value: Prepare for the new Chainbreaker gear set!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_201
values.value: Use Liberator's Silk to craft this elegant gear!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_ARCGEAR_203
values.value: Craft this ring and let your cavalry run free!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_156
values.value: Enough Relics to get Loras and Grey Worm to level 20!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_157
values.value: Accelerate Loras's growth with this pack!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_158
values.value: Level up Grey Worm, Rhaegar, Melisandre and Margaery!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_159
values.value: Level up Daenerys, Cersei, Theon and Loras!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_HEROES_160
values.value: Level up Hodor, Daenerys, Varys and Sansa!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_TRINKET_90
values.value: Masterfully command your cavalry troops with this trinket!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_MTX_TYM_1
values.value: Prove your worth on the field of battle!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_CRAFT_1
values.value:
The Rhoynar were river-farers who once ruled the banks of the mighty Rhoyne in Essos. After more than two centuries of bloody conflict with the Valyrian Freehold, the Rhoynish city-states united in a great alliance. Only Princess Nymeria dissented, forseeing the terrible wrath of the dragonlords. Her fears came to pass when three hundred dragons rained fire from the sky...

Craft any event gear to earn points! Hardy Silks materials for the Rhoynish Voyager gear set are available in other Nymeria: Princess of Dorne events. 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_CRAFT_2
values.value:
Nymeria's wanderings were finally at an end. She and Mors wed along with hundreds of Rhoynar and Dornishmen, uniting their peoples forevermore. In celebration, she burned her fleet and declared her new husband Prince of Dorne. Yet this bid for dominion would not go unchallenged, and so began a long war for unification.

Craft any Trinket to earn points! Earn materials for the Sextant Trinket by defeating creatures in the Nymeria's War event. 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_HOLIDAY_GOLD_2
values.value:
Gold purchased from the Store awards points toward this event.

Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase.

Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends.

Gold purchased from the Store awards points toward this event.

Daily Deliveries and Rewards Passes only award points for initial gold received at the time of purchase.

Rewards must be collected before the promotion ends.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_PVE_1
values.value:
Nymeria knew there was only way to survive—flee the dragonlords. She gathered what remained of her people in a ragtag fleet and escaped into the southern seas. A long and terrible voyage followed; for three years, they were ravaged by storms, disease, pirates, and slavers, until finally a new land graced the horizon.

Defeat Dragon Riders, Essos Pirates, and Scorpions to earn points! 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_PVE_2
values.value:
Victory was not easy nor swift, but the combined might of the Rhoynar and Martells was formidable. Battle after battle, they defeated and exiled every petty king they faced, swelling the ranks of the Night's Watch with fallen rulers. Only Yorick V Yronwood, the greatest of the Dornish kings, continued to stand against them.

Defeat any non-event creature on the map to earn points! While this event is active, non-event creatures drop materials for the new Sextant trinket, which can be crafted for points in the Love and Power event. 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_PVE_RALLY_1
values.value:
After nine years of bloodshed, Mors Martell and Yorick V Yronwood fatefully crossed spears at the Third Battle of the Boneway, and Nymeria was left a widow. Now the sole commander of the Martell armies, she did battle with her husband's slayer for two years more before she defeated him. Yronwood bent the knee, and Dorne was at last one land under one ruler.

Defeat Dornish Spearmen to earn points! 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_TRADE_1
values.value:
Dorne—a harsh land bleached by sun and blasted by sand, where poor lords and petty kings endlessly feud over scarce resources. Most did not welcome the arrival of Nymeria's fleet. Lord Mors Martell, however, felt differently. The Rhoynar possessed a wealth of knowledge and skill, far more advanced than any he had seen... and they were led by a fierce and beautiful princess who captured his heart.

Braavosi Loan trophy recipes are available while this event is active. Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points! 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_TRADE_2
values.value:
Princess Nymeria reigned over a united Dorne for nearly twenty-seven years, a peerless woman. The husbands she took acted only as counselers and consorts. The customs of the Rhoynar became the customs of the Dornish, and so she was suceeded by her oldest child, a daughter. Prince or princess matters not, and so Dorne is singular among the Seven Kingdoms to this day.

Exchange Braavosi Loan trophies in the Recipes tab of your Inventory to earn points. This event's Recipes are your last chance to use Braavosi Loan trophies before they can only be exchanged for Trader's Scrip! 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_NYMERIA_UMBRELLA_1
values.value:
Once a ruler of the Rhoynar, the courageous Princess Nymeria cemented her legacy by leading her people on a perilous seafaring voyage to a new land, one untouched by the shadow of the Valyrian Freehold. Landing on the shores of Westeros, she would join her forces and her hand with Lord Mors Martell’s, and together they would forge a principality—one that doesn’t shy away from a woman's rule.

Look for these Featured Rewards throughout the Nymeria: Princess of Dorne event:
* Hardy Silks are used to craft the Rhoynish Voyager gear set!
* Sextant Components are used to craft the Sextant trinket!
* Braavosi Loan trophies can be traded for prizes in the Recipes tab of your Inventory while the Landfall in Westeros or Nymeria's Legacy events are active. Remember to use all your Braavosi Loan trophies before the Nymeria's Legacy event ends!

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_REGIONCONTROL_ENABLE_INTRO_1
values.value:
The whole of Westeros is made up of eight significant regions: The Seven Kingdoms of old and the Crownlands. Each has its Capital, represented by the 4 and 4.5 Star seats of power. Holding any of these is a great achievement for a ruler and an allegiance, and vital for making a claim to the Iron Throne itself.

Under Region Control rules, if your Allegiance wishes to march on a region's capital it must control enough seats of power within that region. This applies both to rallies and reinforcing! You can use this to your advantage to cut off an entrenched seat holder's lines of support, or to put down a would-be usurper by denying them the seats they need to contest your rule.

Each Capital lists its March Requirement, which might be a number of seats or total stars of seats in the same region. Each seat adds to your allegiance's region control total, excluding the Capital itself.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_STANDALONE_FLASHBACK_CRAFT_7_8
values.value:
The past is written and the ink is dry, but it has much to teach those with the power to read it.

Craft any Season VII or VIII event gear to earn points! Earn materials for select gear sets by defeating creatures in the Three-Eyed Raven: Vision event, or by trading Flux in the Recipes tab of your Inventory.

Season VII Gear Sets: Ironborn Captain, Laughing Knight, Citadel Inquisitor, Fledgling Squire, Winter Survivor, Storm Lord, Iron Keyholder

Season VIII Gear Sets: Targaryen Royal, Valyrian Champion, Festival Carouser, Dragon Rider, Valyrian Bloodmage, Living Mountain, Northern Noble

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_SWEEPS_TOURNAMENT_BUILDING_POWER_1
values.value:
Wealth is its own sort of magic. Put a coin in the right hands and watch it transform into high stone walls, a laden banquet table, or a keen knife and someone to wield it.
Begin building or upgrading any building to earn points!

This event is part of the "Tournament of the Old Gods." Score points to earn a higher Leaderboard standing in this special Kingdom versus Kingdom event!

 * A Kingdom Ranking Leaderboard will track the total points scored by all players within each kingdom.
 * Rewards and Tournament Points will be bestowed to all players based on their Kingdoms rankings at the end of this event.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_SWEEPS_TOURNAMENT_CRAFT_ANY_1
values.value:
In this fight, a brittle blade could be a death sentence. Make sure your weapons are strong enough to see you through the night.
Craft gear in the Smithy to earn points!

This event is part of the "Tournament of the Old Gods." Score points to earn a higher Leaderboard standing in this special Kingdom versus Kingdom event!

 * A Kingdom Ranking Leaderboard will track the total points scored by all players within each kingdom.
 * Rewards and Tournament Points will be bestowed to all players based on their Kingdoms rankings at the end of this event.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_SWEEPS_TOURNAMENT_DRAGON_POWER_1
values.value:
The dragons of the past shaped the fate of Westeros, forging a kingdom through fire and blood until most of the known world bent the knee to their might. Now that you have a dragon of your own, what will the histories say about you?
Complete any Dragon Research, feed your dragon, or level up your dragon to earn points! You can also earn points by Completing ‘Rise of the Dragons’ recipes.

This event is part of the "Tournament of the Old Gods." Score points to earn a higher Leaderboard standing in this special Kingdom versus Kingdom event!

 * A Kingdom Ranking Leaderboard will track the total points scored by all players within each kingdom.
 * Rewards and Tournament Points will be bestowed to all players based on their Kingdoms rankings at the end of this event.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_SWEEPS_TOURNAMENT_HERO_POWER_1
values.value:
Today a liberator, tomorrow a conqueror; those with influence over the destiny of Westeros are often judged in stark measure - but
their mark on history cannot be denied. Make your mark with your champion and small council - for good or ill - and be immortalized as
heroes of the great game!
Navigate to the Tower of the Hand in your city to manage and upgrade your
collection. Earn points by unlocking and leveling up Heroes!

This event is part of the "Tournament of the Old Gods." Score points to earn a higher Leaderboard standing in this special Kingdom versus Kingdom event!

 * A Kingdom Ranking Leaderboard will track the total points scored by all players within each kingdom.
 * Rewards and Tournament Points will be bestowed to all players based on their Kingdoms rankings at the end of this event.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_SWEEPS_TOURNAMENT_RESEARCH_POWER_1
values.value:
What do maesters, sorcerers, and septons have in common? They embrace the unknown which others fear. Let that fear be your strength and none will defy you.
Begin research in any tree to earn points!

This event is part of the "Tournament of the Old Gods." Score points to earn a higher Leaderboard standing in this special Kingdom versus Kingdom event!

 * A Kingdom Ranking Leaderboard will track the total points scored by all players within each kingdom.
 * Rewards and Tournament Points will be bestowed to all players based on their Kingdoms rankings at the end of this event.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_SWEEPS_TOURNAMENT_SOP_ST_1
values.value:
Chaos is a ladder. Many who try to climb it fail and never get to try again. The fall breaks them. And some are given a chance to climb, but they refuse. They cling to the realm, or the gods, or love. Illusions. Only the ladder is real. The climb is all there is.” - Lord Baelish

Defeat other players at Strategic Terrain and Seats of Power to earn points! No points are earned for defeating other players at Keeps.

This event is part of the "Tournament of the Old Gods." Score points to earn a higher Leaderboard standing in this special Kingdom versus Kingdom event!

 * A Kingdom Ranking Leaderboard will track the total points scored by all players within each kingdom.
 * Rewards and Tournament Points will be bestowed to all players based on their Kingdoms rankings at the end of this event.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_SWEEPS_TOURNAMENT_TROOP_TRAIN_1
values.value:
Brave young soldiers do not ride into battle without cause. They fight for home, for loved ones, for glory, honor, and fear. Wield those ideas like weapons, and armies will bow to your command.

Train troops to earn points!

This event is part of the "Tournament of the Old Gods." Score points to earn a higher Leaderboard standing in this special Kingdom versus Kingdom event!

 * A Kingdom Ranking Leaderboard will track the total points scored by all players within each kingdom.
 * Rewards and Tournament Points will be bestowed to all players based on their Kingdoms rankings at the end of this event.

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_TESTYOURMETTLE
values.value:
(In this event, points are earned every few minutes by holding a Seat of Power in a neutral kingdom.)
In the throes of battle, a legend is born! From across the realm, your rival Lords and Ladies assemble to battle on a level playing field, neutral ground. They are willing to risk their name for the promise of glory, or perhaps even infamy. For 24 hours, you too can seize this opportunity, to enter the crucible and claim a Seat of Power on these new lands! Defend it with all your might, and inscribe your name in the annals of history. When the dust settles, your valor will be measured by how long you were capable of holding onto a Seat of Power. But beware, the others vying for glory will not give up without a fight. Are you prepared to Test Your Mettle?

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_TESTYOURMETTLE_1
values.value:
(In this event, points are earned every few minutes by holding a Seat of Power in a neutral kingdom.)
In the throes of battle, a legend is born! From across the realm, your rival Lords and Ladies assemble to battle on a level playing field, neutral ground. They are willing to risk their name for the promise of glory, or perhaps even infamy. For 24 hours, you too can seize this opportunity, to enter the crucible and claim a Seat of Power on these new lands! Defend it with all your might, and inscribe your name in the annals of history. When the dust settles, your valor will be measured by how long you were capable of holding onto a Seat of Power. But beware, the others vying for glory will not give up without a fight. Are you prepared to Test Your Mettle?

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESC_MKT_RETURN_TO_WESTEROS_1
values.value:
Westeros has long been a land of conquerors and fierce rulers. From the cold, harsh lands in the North to the simmering heat of Dorne. From Braavos, across the Dothraki Sea, and the newly renamed "Bay of Dragons" in Ghiscar. Valiant lords, ruthless strategists, ardent devotees, and Breakers of Chains have all shaped its history... and continue to do so still.

Will you become one, too?

values.name: ACTIVITY_DESC_TITHING_1
values.value:
Donate to your lord to vie for their favor!

*Complete Tithing Event Recipes to earn Leaderboard points.
*Earn powerful Instant Boosts for placing higher on the Leaderboard.

values.name: ACTIVITY_NAME_MTX_HEROES_156
values.value: The Loras and Grey Worm Launch Pack

values.name: ACTIVITY_NAME_MTX_TYM_2
values.value: Test Your Mettle Instant Boost Pack

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_FREEDOM_SWEEPS_TOURNAMENT_1
values.value: Vie for the Old Gods' favor!

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_NYMERIA_TRADE_2
values.value: Not a kingdom, but a principality.

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_REGIONCONTROL_ENABLE_INTRO_1
values.value: To take a capital, you must control its lands!

values.name: ACTIVITY_SPLASH_STANDALONE_FLASHBACK_CRAFT_7_8
values.value: Craft Season VII and VIII Gear!

values.name: ALCHEMY_FLUX_PRESTIGE_RECIPE_DESC
values.value: While this Flux Recipes event is active, you can trade Flux for House Prestige in the Recipes tab of your Inventory. Recipe events are temporary so trade while you can!

values.name: ALCHEMY_RECIPE_EVENT_NYMERIA_TROPHY_GENERIC_DESC
values.value: Spend your Braavosi Loan Trophies before the event ends and this recipe disappears!

values.name: ITEM_EVENT_TROPHY_NYMERIA_1_DESC
values.value:
Can be used in Recipes during the Nymeria: Princess of Dorne event, or converted to Trader's Scrip when the event ends. 
Part of the 'Nymeria: Princess of Dorne' Event

values.name: MONSTER_NYMERIA_1_DESC
values.value: A soldier for a petty king, these scrappy fighters know how to use the harsh desert landscape to their advantage.

values.name: MONSTER_NYMERIA_2_DESC
values.value: Those who ride dragons fear little, for they seek to tame the sky itself. Engulfed by flame, rent by gnashing teeth, or gutted by sharp claws, a dragon's enemies know no peace.

values.name: MONSTER_NYMERIA_3_DESC
values.value: "I have seen things... I've seen a pirate who wore his weight in gold, whose ships had sails of colored silk." - Doreah

values.name: MONSTER_NYMERIA_4_DESC
values.value: Though their sting is not as vile as the Manticore's, treading on a den of these venomous creatures is always a danger when traversing the deserts of Dorne.

values.name: PROPERTY_DRAGONMARCHERTROOPATTACKVSPLAYER_DESC
values.value: Increases Troop Attack when marching against another player with your dragon

values.name: PROPERTY_DRAGONMARCHERTROOPDEFENSEVSPLAYER_DESC
values.value: Increases Troop Defense when marching against another player with your dragon

values.name: PROPERTY_DRAGONMARCHERTROOPHEALTHVSPLAYER_DESC
values.value: Increases Troop Health when marching against another player with your dragon

values.name: SESSIONREWARD_CSR_ES_NYMERIA_DESC
values.value:
Your special event shipment for the Nymeria event can contain a variety of rewards.

You can claim up to four event shipments every 24 hours. If you claim them all, you will receive an Instant Boost!

values.name: DRIVEN_DRAGONFEEDXPBONUS_ALPHA_DESCRIPTION
values.value: Bonus to XP from Feeding your dragon
